badge: Evangelism and Discipleship in the Digital World

hero.title: The internet is an unreached country. Your church can enter.
hero.subtitle: We awaken, equip, and walk with churches into the digital mission field. Turn games and social media into evangelism opportunities.
hero.whatsapp_message:
Hello! 👋

I came from the **Home page** of the Missão Digital website, in the main hero section, and clicked the **"Schedule a training"** button.

I’d love to talk and understand how this training could fit our church’s reality.

campo.title: Millions live in this country. Who is proclaiming Christ there?
campo.text_1_intro: While we debate whether the digital world is good or bad,
campo.text_1_rest: are connected to games and online communities. They are neighbors, children, students, colleagues. They are already there.
campo.text_2: The question is not "whether we should go," but "who will?"
campo.quote: The answer is not demonizing technology. It's sending missionaries to this territory.

missao.title: We are missionaries in this country. And we want to take your church with us.
missao.description: We are Navarro and Tereza, a missionary family. We serve as a bridge between the Gospel and the digital and gaming universe, partnering with churches to transform games and social media into opportunities for witness and discipleship.
missao.step_1_desc: We open the church's eyes to the digital mission field.
missao.step_2_desc: We deliver practical tools to turn gaming into mission.
missao.step_3_desc: We advance together in social media, games, and neighborhoods.

projetos.title: Projects ready for your church to enter the field
projetos.subtitle: Each project is a complete, tested, and replicable strategy. Choose the one that best fits your reality.
projetos.daod_desc: The church opens a regular space for games, gamer devotionals, and a path to discipleship. A gateway that never closes.
projetos.gank_desc: The church joins together in a streamer's live to share the Gospel in a coordinated way. A surprise attack of love.
projetos.ninive_desc: A digital missionary trip: an entire weekend logged in to reach souls, not levels.
projetos.campeonato_desc: A gaming tournament with biblical counselors: the championship is the means, discipleship is the goal.

imersao.title: A weekend that transforms your entire church.
imersao.description: The Missionary Immersion is the most complete experience we offer: we awaken the church to the digital field, equip each person with practical tools, and lead everyone to truly evangelize in a single weekend.
imersao.highlight: It's not a lecture. It's a missionary trip to the largest unreached country in the world: the internet.
imersao.cta: I want an immersion for my church
imersao.whatsapp_message:
Hi! 🌍

I came from the **Home page**, in the **Missionary Immersion** section, and clicked **"I want an immersion for my church"**.

We’d like to understand how to bring this complete experience to our church community.

testemunhos.title: Churches that have already entered this field
testemunhos.subtitle: Real stories of transformation in the digital mission field.
testemunhos.t1_texto: In digital evangelism, the person was surprised and happy. We spoke of God's love and, instead of rejection, we were received with deep gratitude.
testemunhos.t2_texto: It was a unique experience that burned in my heart. Besides preaching, we brought joy to the live stream and made a mark on the lives of those on the other side.
testemunhos.t3_texto: Technology generates ideas for the field and connects people. What we learned here will enable a much broader action in God's work.

recursos_section.title: Start now. Free resources for your church.
recursos_section.description: Practical materials for you to begin the digital mission today.
recursos_section.fill_data_desc: To receive the material for free in your email.
recursos_section.success_download: The download of {{resource}} will begin shortly.
recursos_section.success_email: You will also receive the material at: {{email}}
recursos_section.r1_desc: A complete step-by-step guide to implement Digital to Discipleship in your church.
recursos_section.r1_desc_full: Digital to Discipleship (DaoD) is a complete methodology to transform your church's digital environment into an active mission field. This guide includes: church preparation, space structuring, volunteer recruitment, activity schedule, gamer-language devotionals, and follow-up for new converts.
recursos_section.r2_desc: Everything you need to prepare for a successful Evangelistic Gank.
recursos_section.r2_desc_full: The Evangelistic Gank is a coordinated action where the church joins en masse in streamers' lives to share the Gospel lovingly. This checklist includes: spiritual preparation, participant organization, target selection, prepared messages, post-gank follow-up, and much more.
recursos_section.r3_desc: How to use game elements to communicate the message of Christ.
recursos_section.r3_desc_full: Gamification is the application of game elements in non-gaming contexts. This ebook explores how principles like reward, progression, challenge, and community can be used to make discipleship more engaging and effective for the new generation.

apoie_section.title: Walk with us in this mission
apoie_section.description: Missão Digital exists thanks to the support of people and churches who believe in the power of the Gospel to transform lives in the digital world. You can be part of this story in three ways:
apoie_section.path_1_desc: Pray for our family and for the churches we are equipping and people we have evangelized.
apoie_section.path_2_desc: Your financial support helps us continue advancing this mission.
apoie_section.path_3_desc: Invite us to train your church or be a multiplier of Missão Digital in your region.

cta_final.title: The field is open. Is your church ready to enter?
cta_final.subtitle: Let's talk about how Missão Digital can equip your church to reach lives in the digital world.
cta_final.whatsapp_message:
Hello! 🚀

I reached the **end of the Home page**, in the closing CTA section, and clicked **"Talk to us on WhatsApp"**.

I felt challenged to take the next step and wanted to talk about where to start with you.
